title: Apple supplier Skyworks sees no significant production disruptions from coronavirus
description: Skyworks, a chip supplier to Apple, said on Wednesday the coronavirus has not significantly disrupted its manufacturing operations… The post Apple supplier Skyworks sees no significant production disruptions from coronavirus appeared first on MacDailyNews.
content:
The chipmaker, however, cut its second-quarter revenue forecast, saying interruptions in global supply chains is hurting demand for its products.
The company cut its revenue outlook to between $760 million and $770 million, from $800 million to $820 million.
